courseName: International Management and Emerging Economies MSc
description: Our MSc International Management and Emerging Economies programme will provide you with a comprehensive and integrated understanding of the particular challenges facing firms in emerging economies that are becoming increasingly integrated into the global economy.Specific issues include the process of economic reform, the pressures of globalisation and the opportunities for internationalisation at firm-level.
duration: Full-time: 1 year, Part-time: up to 4 years
fees: FeesFor more information, please visit the programme page on our website.
